description: This is a Flutter application main file defining the entry point, main widget 'MyApp', and a stateful home page widget 'MyHomePage' with a simple loading UI.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: StatelessWidget that sets up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: StatefulWidget that receives a title and creates state.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State object for MyHomePage that builds a Scaffold with an AppBar and a centered loading message.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
